page.title: 14Norprint International
page.content: Norprint is certainly the largest single{industrial}employer within our grid,so we arranged to make a visit to discover just what went on there. We were given a guided tour around the factory,which was exremely busy,and full of noise.During this time,we saw a whole mass of things,such as all of the range of hand held{labelling {machines}that were made. Even more interesting to us,was to see the{bar code}machines being used,since these were preparing bar code strips that can be electronically scanned at the till to discover the price of goods,and register their sale automatically. The whole company employs 1500 people,and during the course of a year their{turnover}is usually around Â£30 million;while making 20,000,000,000 labels per annum!
